Hare and Hyena
Writer: Mutugi Kamundi
Illustration: Rob Owen
© African Storybook Initiative, 2014
Test story - side format
Test Story
page #
Long time ago Hare and Hyena were great friends.
Test Story
page #
One day,| Hare said,| “My friend Hyena,|

let us start farming together and we will be rich.”
Test Story
page #
Hyena suggested that it was good to plant maize.|

Hare agreed.
Hare also told Hyena| that it was good for

them to share duties on the farm.
“My work will be guarding the maize from the birds,”

Hare said.
Then Hare told Hyena| to till the land,| plant,| and weed.
Test Story
page #
Hyena complained that he had been given more work.


“My work is not easy.| I will be climbing

trees and chasing birds away day and night.
Test Story
page #
